t: Luke 17
Then*p said he unto the disciples, It*r is*r impossible*r but*r that*r offences*r will*r come:*r but*r woe*r unto*r him,*r through*r whom*r they*r come!*r

And*p as he entered into a certain village, there met him ten men that were lepers, which stood afar off:
And*p they lifted up their voices, and said, Jesus, Master, have mercy on us.
And*p when he saw them, he said unto them, Go*r shew*r yourselves*r unto*r the*r priests.*r And it came to pass, that, as they went, they were cleansed.

And*p fell down on his face at his feet, giving him thanks: and he was a Samaritan.

Remember*rp Lot's*r wife.*r
